message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is way out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,000.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000. This is my final offer.
